item.title: Npm配置以及常用命令
item.description: npm 初始化 npm install -g @vue/cli-service-global create-react-app pm2 nodemon express-generator gulp-cli @vue/cli \ npm配置 access = null also = null always-auth = false bin-links = true browser = null ca = null cache = “C:\Users\robert\AppData\Roaming\npm-cache” cache-lock-retries = 10 cache-lock-stale = 60000 cache-lock-wait = 10000 cache-max = null cache-min = 10 cafile = undefined cert = null color = true depth = null description = true dev = false dry-run = false editor = “notepad.
